title: Average regular season home attendance of the Arizona Cardinals 2008 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2012.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2012 to 2008.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2016.
gold: This graph depicts the average regular season home attendance of the Arizona Cardinals from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average attendance at home games of the Arizona Cardinals was 61,323 .
